question: Which organization endorses IFRS standards in Saudi Arabia?

options.op2: Zakat, Tax, and Customs Authority (ZATCA)
options.op3: Saudi Organization for Chartered Accountants
options.op4: Saudi Central Bank

question: What are the five steps in the IFRS 15 revenue recognition model?

options.op1: Identify contract, determine transaction price, recognize revenue, report costs, close books
options.op2: Recognize revenue, record receivables, post costs, adjust assets, close period
options.op3: Identify contract, identify performance obligations, determine transaction price, allocate price, recognize revenue
options.op4: Report revenue, list obligations, summarize costs, disclose assets, adjust liabilities

question: Under IFRS 15, when is revenue typically recognized?

options.op2: Upon customer payment
options.op3: When control of the promised goods or services is transferred to the customer
options.op4: At the end of the fiscal year

question: What is the primary objective of IFRS 15?

options.op2: To standardize the revenue recognition process across entities
options.op3: To set guidelines for accounting in the oil and gas industry
options.op4: To manage financial instruments
